extendedInfo.description: Do you wonder who is going to win the 2012 US elections? What is the preference of Android users, the Republican or Democratic party? This App is measuring this exactly: we need your opinion! Download this App and start clicking on your favourite party. You will see the world wide results instantly! The results will be growing until the final Election Day. Share it with friends to get as many people voting.-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Note:This application is not meant to interfere the elections in any way. There is no intention to influence peopleâs opinion. The application is only a tool to measure the popularity of both parties. This is not a real reflection of the results obtained at the end of the election. There is no link between either Democratic or Republican parties and DelftSoft. -----------------------------------------------------------------------------Note: This free app may contain notification ads-----------------------------------------------------------------------------Tags: US, USA, Elections, President, Candidate, Democrats, Republicans, Winner, Vote, Winning, Poll, Worldwide, Obama, Barack, Romney, Mitt, versus, vs

reviews.title: Think Smart
reviews.comment: Ron Paul did alot better than the msm told you. Im not a conspiracy theorist but i am a critical thinker. Stop and look around do research and connect dots. People in power do not want paul because he is dangerous to them. He will make them lose their money and power
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good idea but needs a lot more users to be effective

reviews.title: Not working?How do u know?
reviews.comment: U chose?is that it?I c no instructions,does it give totals?does anyone know how to use the app?vote ur Max votes?if u vote ur Max votes how is it at all accurate?sum1 who gets it please inform!is there more than one screen?I think it crazy folks create all these apps but rarely do they include info on how 2 use them!any1 know how 2 use it?If u do please comment.I didn\'t want 2 give star but u can\'t submit without 1. I rate 0 star.Note 2 App designer,include instructions!anything more than push button would b advantageous.I\'ll give it a few days for a reply then uninstall n try an app that informs user of...g...anything.
